issue.title: Problem compiling against gazebo using pkg-config and a local sdformat install

content.raw:
As a workaround, you can use cmake `find_package(gazebo)` instead of pkg-config. I think the critical change from pull request #1161 is using `find_package` for sdformat instead of pkg-config, since [sdf_config.cmake.in](https://bitbucket.org/osrf/sdformat/src/0c27601e982e52e1eda04ff70bdb830371ac3c56/cmake/sdf_config.cmake.in?at=default) uses `list(APPEND …)`, which generates strings separated by `;`'s.

For some reason, our [pkgconfig test](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/40da355adddca71c1428e7176c570c48bc8407b4/test/pkgconfig/plugin/CMakeLists.txt?at=default) still passes. Can you post a CMakeLists.txt that demonstrates the problem for you?
